description: This file is a React component (`MoodChart.jsx`) that visualizes mood data with line and bar charts, using SVG elements. It renders a mood over time line chart and a last 7 days bar chart, including internal helper components `LineChart` and `BarChart`. It also imports a utility function `moodToColor` for color mapping.

methods.name: MoodChart({ timeSeriesPoints, last7Bars })
methods.description: React functional component rendering mood charts based on provided time series points and last 7 bars data.

methods.name: LineChart({ data })
methods.description: Elementary component that renders a line chart SVG based on input data points.

methods.name: BarChart({ data })
methods.description: Elementary component that renders a bar chart SVG for last 7 days mood data.
